revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #05 Perasi (Aspear) |image = [[File:Aspear.png]] |caption = Su piel es un tanto áspera, pero por dentro es muy jugosa. Se caracteriza por un puntito de acidez. |growtime = 2m |harvest = 6 bayas |replant = 50% |points = 9 |flavor =
*0 picante *0 seco *0 dulce *0 amargo *10 ácido }} '''Perasi (Aspear)''' es un tipo de [[Berries|baya]] que puede ser plantada en la [[Farm|Granja]] para obtener [[Farming Points|Puntos de Granja]]. Se puede obtener como recomensa aleatoria al derrotar Pokémon salvajes en las rutas.
{| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" |+ Growth Stages !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 10 secs || 40 secs || 1 min || 2 mins - 4 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:AspearTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:AspearTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:AspearTreeBerry.png|50px]] |}
{| class="wikitable collapsible" | style="text-align: center;" |+ Ripening Time with Modifiers ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time |- ! None | 2 mins -
4 mins |- ! Sprayduck | 1 min 20 secs -
2 mins 40 secs |}
== Flow Chart == [[File:Aspear_Flow_Chart.png|100px]]
==Uses== ===Mutations===
Aspear berries can be used to mutate the following berries.

[[File:Rawst.png|20px]] [[Rawst]]

[[File:Oran.png|20px]] [[Oran]]
[[File:Sitrus.png|20px]] [[Sitrus]] |- | [[File:Qualot.png|20px]] [[Qualot]] || [[File:Cheri.png|20px]] [[Cheri]]
[[File:Pecha.png|20px]] [[Pecha]] |- | [[File:Rabuta.png|20px]] [[Rabuta]] || [[File:Aguav.png|20px]] [[Aguav]] |- |}

revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #05 Perasi (Aspear) |image = [[File:Aspear.png]] |caption = Su piel es un tanto áspera, pero por dentro es muy jugosa. Se caracteriza por un puntito de acidez. |growtime = 2m |harvest = 6 bayas |replant = 50% |points = 9 |flavor =
*0 picante *0 seco *0 dulce *0 amargo *10 ácido }}
'''Aspear''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]] to obtain [[Farming Points|Farm Points]]. It can be obtained as a random drop by defeating wild Pokémon on routes.
{| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" |+ Growth Stages !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 10 secs || 40 secs || 1 min || 2 mins - 4 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:AspearTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:AspearTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:AspearTreeBerry.png|50px]] |}
{| class="wikitable collapsible" | style="text-align: center;" |+ Ripening Time with Modifiers ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time |- ! None | 2 mins -
4 mins |- ! Sprayduck | 1 min 20 secs -
2 mins 40 secs |}
== Flow Chart == [[File:Aspear_Flow_Chart.png|100px]]
==Uses== ===Mutations===
Aspear berries can be used to mutate the following berries.
{| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |- ! Used In !! With |- | [[File:Nanab.png|20px]] [[Nanab]] || [[File:Pecha.png|20px]] [[Pecha]] |- | [[File:Pinap.png|20px]] [[Pinap]] || [[File:Sitrus.png|20px]] [[Sitrus]] |- | [[File:Iapapa.png|20px]] [[Iapapa]] || - |- | [[File:Lum.png|20px]] [[Lum]] || [[File:Cheri.png|20px]] [[Cheri]]

[[File:Pecha.png|20px]] [[Pecha]]

[[File:Oran.png|20px]] [[Oran]]

[[File:Pecha.png|20px]] [[Pecha]] |- | [[File:Rabuta.png|20px]] [[Rabuta]] || [[File:Aguav.png|20px]] [[Aguav]] |- |}
